title: Cancel find operations in the DOM Explorer
body:
This feature would add an 'x' button the search box in the debugger and DOM Explorer that would cancel a find operation once started.

Proposed Design
- After committing a search and locking the text box a red 'x' is added in the far right of the control (in place of the clear button) that once pressed will cancel the find operation and return the text box to the edit state (placing focus at the end of the text)
- Is in tab order after the (now) read only text box
- Will not clear the text box
- Will not change any in page find highlighting
